title: Welcome home to this newer townhome at Residences at Mascher!
description:
Welcome home to this newer townhome at Residences at Mascher.This townhome offers off street privacy, in an unbeatable location with 1-2 blocks of Lazer Wolf, Wm Mulherins & sons, and front street cafe. Even with all the neighborhood has to offer, you may never want to leave this 3 bed 3 full bath home with 3 outdoor spaces. Entering the home on the first level, you have a large foyer from the front door, as well as garage access, a full bath, and down a few steps, you have a massive utility room with abundant storage. Entering into the living area, cozy up by the gas fireplace, or make your way out to your first of three outdoor spaces. Just a few steps up from the living room is your massive kitchen and dining room which are complete with herringbone backsplash and modern finish selection. Enter your second outdoor space with a large elevated patio with gas grill hookup for all your barbeque, morning coffee and cocktail needs. The third floor is appointed with 2 large light filled bedrooms, a full bathroom, a linen closet and laundry room. The current owner has added beautiful custom built ins to make a wonderful in home office or spacious guest room. The owner suite offers a large walk in closet as well as an en suite bathroom with glass enclosure shower, double vanity, and large soaking tub. Each bedroom is equipped with ceiling fans and custom blinds can be found throughout the home. The roofdeck offers both city and bridge views to complete all your indoor/outdoor living needs and wants. HOA fees paid by the owner.

title: Enjoy life in the heart of Fishtown!
description:
Enjoy life in the heart of Fishtown! This spacious, well maintained 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath rowhome is located across from Adaire school and just steps from restaurants, nightlife, parks, and shopping. Every room in this home is flooded with natural light and the privacy of the outdoor spaces make for a quiet respite from the city. The heart of this home is the first floor where the large kitchen is central to both the dining room and living room, and features endless cabinets, a buffet counter and breakfast bar. The dining room opens to a private deck overlooking the backyard to relax with your morning coffee and the unique French doors offer plenty of natural light and fresh air. Through the kitchen, the cozy living room is complete with a large closet and a gas fireplace. This floor also offers a convenient half bath. On the second floor you will find 2 large bedrooms both with ensuite baths and enormous double closets. This floor also includes the laundry room and a linen closet. The third floor also features 2 bedrooms. The rear bedroom has an ensuite bath that also can be accessed from the hallway. It features a large walk-in closet and entrance to a rear deck overlooking the backyard. The front bedroom also makes a great office, playroom or third floor family room. This home boasts an amount of storage rarely seen in row homes. Large closets in every bedroom and the living room, linen closets on the upper floors and a full basement for storage. title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* One bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House (Grays
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Roof Deck, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
